column5: Let us look at Network Theory in Risk Assessment. We will be doing so using the Bow-Tie method.
The Bow-Tie method starts with a look at a Hazard that can lead to an Event.
In this run-through of the model we look at Business E-mail Compromise that leads to fraud.
The fraudsters could target our company, our customers or our partners.
The 2018 Internet Crime Report had the combination of Business Email Compromise and Email Account Compromise listed at the very top.
The reported Victim Loss was the incredible amount of 1.3 Billion US dollars.
